English-French In Domain Out of Domain Adequacy Adequacy .</S><S sid="7" ssid="5">We dropped, however, one of the languages, Finnish, partly to keep the number of tracks manageable, partly because we assumed that it would be hard to find enough Finnish speakers for the manual evaluation.</S><S sid="64" ssid="3">Also, the argument has been made that machine translation performance should be evaluated via task-based evaluation metrics, i.e. how much it assists performing a useful task, such as supporting human translators or aiding the analysis of texts.</S><S sid="65" ssid="4">The main disadvantage of manual evaluation is that it is time-consuming and thus too expensive to do frequently.</S>
